attributes.action: introduce legislation making it illegal for banks or other organisations from contacting customers using automated telephone messaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks that received money in the recent bailout are using pre-recorded messages to contact customers late in making credit card payments. It is unacceptable that any organisation cannot pay its customers the common courtesy of ringing them in person, but rather using methods that will be considered intimitatory by the elderly, those with mental health conditiond, and other vulnerable adults.
